feed.title: WhoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.46.1 - Patch | Fix the MySQL connection init to allow native passwords for older versions
entry.content:
Fixes: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/issues/351

ğŸ› Bug Fixes This PR fixes the initialization of the MySQL connection (to allow native passwords - to support older versions of MySQL). We also default to UTC timezone (the default behavior).

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.47.0 - Big Release - Theme upgrade, reborn Scratchpad, so much more #397
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

âœ¨ Improvements

Improved Plugin System: - To speed up our development, we modified the core backend so that adding new data sources is easier and more unified. There's less repeated code and more developer enjoyment ğŸ˜Š

Theme Upgrade:
- WhoDB has a new look! Our designers spent some time looking at how to make WhoDB look more streamlined and professional. Let us know your thoughts ğŸ’…

Tailwind Upgrade to V4 - Alongside the theme changes, we have moved up to Tailwind V4 ğŸŒ¬ï¸

End-to-end Testing - More stability, we should be able to update faster now. Expect bugs and breakage ğŸ˜³

Scratchpad Reborn - The Scratchpad saw some major love in this release. We have added: - Pages - organise your scratchpads into individual notebooks ğŸ—„ï¸ - History - see what queries you ran ğŸ“œ - Query replay - instantly rerun a query from the History view ğŸ”„ - Query edit - want to modify a query you ran a day ago? Go on then. Do it from the History view ğŸ™

ğŸ› Bug Fixes

Dependabot updates - Updated several dependencies ğŸ”§

Tweaks to the Update and Delete logic - More flexibility in updating and deleting rows ğŸš¡

ğŸ“– Admin stuff

Apache 2 License - WhoDB is officially Apache 2 licensed! We have moved away from the GPL due to its restrictive nature. Unfortunately, we have had to take away some GPL code that we did not have permission for, but, we will recreate the functionality as soon as possible ğŸš„

https://whodb.com is live! - Happy happy ğŸ¥‚

Thank you to everyone who contributed to this release! ğŸš€
Your feedback and support are invaluable.

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump highlight.run from 9.7.2 to 9.14.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/382
  • build(deps-dev): bump @types/lodash from 4.17.13 to 4.17.16 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/370
  • build(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group in /frontend with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/383
  • build(deps): bump react-router-dom from 6.28.0 to 7.4.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/380
  • build(deps): bump @apollo/client from 3.12.3 to 3.13.5 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/381
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.60 to 0.17.68 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/377
  • Add plugin system, updates to tailwind, theme by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/395
  • update instances to whodb.com from whodb.clidey.com by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/396
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/cli from 5.0.3 to 5.0.5 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/390
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/typescript-operations from 4.4.0 to 4.6.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/392
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/typescript from 4.1.2 to 4.1.6 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/391

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.46.1...0.47.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.48.0 - Release - Posthog integration, Primary key and Nullable modifiers added to SQL databases
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

âœ¨ Improvements

Posthog integration: - We removed Highlight.run as it was not giving us any actionable data. Instead we'll trial Posthog as we've heard some very good things about it. We've taken steps to redact data and make it as anonymous as we can. We have also modified it to be opt-out. Please bear with us! ğŸ˜Š

Ability to select a primary key:
- WhoDB now lets you mark a field as the primary key in the table builder! It's available for all the SQL databases. ğŸ’…

Ability to explicitly mark a field as nullable:
- WhoDB now lets you mark a field as nullable! It's available for all the SQL databases. ğŸ’…

ğŸ› Bug Fixes

Dependabot updates - Updated several dependencies ğŸ”§

Thank you to everyone who contributed to this release! ğŸš€
Your feedback and support are invaluable.

What's Changed

  • Ah/feature/bettermetrics by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/404
  • build(deps): bump github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql from 1.7.0 to 1.9.2 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/401
  • build(deps): bump remark-gfm from 4.0.0 to 4.0.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/399
  • build(deps): bump uuid from 11.0.3 to 11.1.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/388
  • build(deps): bump html-to-image from 1.11.11 to 1.11.13 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/387
  • build(deps): bump github.com/go-chi/chi/v5 from 5.2.0 to 5.2.1 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/385
  • build(deps-dev): bump tailwindcss from 4.1.2 to 4.1.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/400
  • Add Primary Key and Nullable modifiers to sql-based db by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/405

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.47.0...0.48.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.49.0 - Release - Anthropic fixes, UI dropdown changes
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

âœ¨ Improvements

Anthropic Integration - more models: - The Anthropic integration has been updated with the latest models offered by the Anthropic API! Token count is set to max for each. ğŸ˜Š

Updates to saving and deleting:
- You should now be able to delete and update rows in a table without a primary key. Be careful - it will do a blanket where on all of the unchanged values, so it could result in duplicate changes or issues. As usual, we recommend having a primary key for this kind of stuff! ğŸª‰

Longer dropdowns:
- Dropdowns now have a bigger maximum height so that they do not feel as cramped. ğŸ’…

ğŸ› Bug Fixes

Anthropic Integration - changes to the HTTP API - Originally the Anthropic HTTP API streamed data but now it looks like it has changed to a single response per request. We've updated it to accommodate that.

Dependabot updates - Updated several dependencies ğŸ”§

Thank you to everyone who contributed to this release! ğŸš€
Your feedback and support are invaluable.

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.68 to 0.17.70 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/407
  • build(deps): bump posthog-js from 1.235.6 to 1.236.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/411

  • build(deps): bump posthog-js from 1.236.0 to 1.236.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/415
  • build(deps): bump github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2 from 2.5.23 to 2.5.24 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/414
  • build(deps-dev): bump @parcel/transformer-webmanifest from 2.13.3 to 2.14.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/416
  • build(deps): bump @codemirror/view from 6.36.2 to 6.36.5 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/417
  • build(deps-dev): bump @tailwindcss/postcss from 4.0.16 to 4.1.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/412
  • build(deps-dev): bump parcel from 2.13.3 to 2.14.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/408
  • build(deps-dev): bump tailwindcss from 4.1.3 to 4.1.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/422
  • build(deps-dev): bump cypress from 14.2.1 to 14.3.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/420
  • build(deps): bump @reduxjs/toolkit from 2.5.0 to 2.7.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/418
  • build(deps): bump posthog-js from 1.236.1 to 1.236.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/426
  • build(deps): bump tailwind-merge from 3.0.2 to 3.2.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/427
  • Ah/bugfix/anthropic integration by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/433
  • build(deps): bump react-markdown from 9.0.3 to 10.1.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/432
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 12.6.3 to 12.7.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/431
  • build(deps): bump react-router-dom from 7.5.0 to 7.5.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/430
  • build(deps): bump @apollo/client from 3.13.5 to 3.13.8 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/428
  • build(deps): bump github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2 from 2.5.24 to 2.5.25 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/425
